name: rekodi
description: A cross platform desktop remote for Kodi/Xbmc
author: Bram van Oploo <bram@sudo-systems.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:osx && npm run build:win && npm run build:linux
scripts.pack: npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win && npm run pack:linux
scripts.pack:linux: npm run build:linux && npm run copy:linux_install && npm run pack:deb_ia32 && npm run pack:deb_x64 && npm run pack:rpm
scripts.pack:deb_ia32: fpm -f -t deb -a i386 -n rekodi -v 0.1.0 --vendor "sudo-systems.com" -m "<bram@sudo-systems.com>" --description "A cross platform desktop remote for Kodi/Xbmc" --deb-no-default-config-files --after-install ./app_builds/linux/rekodi-linux-ia32/install.sh -p ./app_builds/linux --prefix /usr/share -C ./app_builds/linux -s dir rekodi-linux-ia32
scripts.pack:deb_x64: fpm -f -t deb -a x86_64 -n rekodi -v 0.1.0 --vendor "sudo-systems.com" -m "<bram@sudo-systems.com>" --description "A cross platform desktop remote for Kodi/Xbmc" --deb-no-default-config-files --after-install ./app_builds/linux/rekodi-linux-x64/install.sh -p ./app_builds/linux --prefix /usr/share -C ./app_builds/linux -s dir rekodi-linux-x64
scripts.pack:rpm: fpm -f -t rpm -a noarch -n rekodi -v 0.1.0 --vendor "sudo-systems.com" -m "<bram@sudo-systems.com>" --description "A cross platform desktop remote for Kodi/Xbmc" --epoch 1 -p --after-install ./app_builds/linux/rekodi-linux-ia32/install.sh ./app_builds/linux --prefix /etc -C ./app_builds/linux -s dir rekodi-linux-ia32
